paragraphs: On Tuesday, August 12, the press service of the Prague police published a video of a curious incident that occurred early in the morning on August 8 in the Golešovice district.

Then the thief stole a safe from the shopping center, walked 200 meters along Strojnická street, and sat down to open the metal box near the administrative building, which, unfortunately for the criminal, turned out to be the Police Headquarters of the Czech Republic.
The security guards saw this scene through the surveillance cameras and immediately sent a patrol to the brazen thief. The thief was quickly apprehended.

"Remember that talented smart guy who stole a safe in the shopping center, brought it to the police station building, and started cracking it right under the cameras? This happened on Friday, and today we have come to the conclusion that we cannot deprive you of personnel on the scene."
At the same time, law enforcement officials stated, "We want to remind you of the old good rule: do not take what does not belong to you."
The clumsy thief faces up to two years in prison for the theft.
